00048 namespace SimSite3D{
00049 
00051   typedef struct{
00052     my_float_t edge_len[3];   
00053     interact_pts_vci vertices[3];      
00054   }triangle_t;
00055     
00056   // This is a bit old -- I wouldn't use a list any more.  I wonder what the
00057   // current penalty is for using a list.  It might be minimal since this is
00058   // not an inner processing loop
00059   typedef triangle_t* triangle_ptr;
00060   typedef std::vector<std::list<triangle_t>::iterator> idx_tbl_lvl_short;
00061   typedef idx_tbl_lvl_short::const_iterator bucket_vci;
00062   typedef std::vector<idx_tbl_lvl_short> idx_tbl_lvl_long;
00063   typedef std::vector<idx_tbl_lvl_long> idx_tbl_lvl_perimeter;
00064   typedef std::vector<idx_tbl_lvl_perimeter> idx_tbl_lvl_class;
00065   typedef std::vector<idx_tbl_lvl_class> index_table_t;
00066 
00069   class ModelSitemap : public Sitemap{
00070   public:
00071     ModelSitemap(const std::string path, const std::string struct_id,
00072                  const BaseParameters& args, 
00073                  const my_float_t max_corr_surf_pt_dist,
00074                  const bool normalize = true,
00075                  const bool load_hbond_surfaces = false,
00076                  const bool hydrophobic_query = false);
00077 
00078     virtual
00079     ~ModelSitemap();
00080 
00082 
00093     virtual bool 
00094     get_bucket_iters(const uint c, const my_float_t perimeter,
00095                      const my_float_t max_len, const my_float_t min_len,
00096                      bucket_vci* bucket_begin, bucket_vci* bucket_end);
00097 
00098     bool report_table_stats(std::ostream& out);
00099 
00100     void init_positions_octrees(const my_float_t max_dist, 
00101                                 const my_float_t min_side_len,
00102                                 const uint max_numel);
00103 
00104     inline void 
00105     transform(const my_float_t* R, const my_float_t* T,
00106               const bool transform_mesh = true,
00107               const bool transform_hbond_surfaces = true)
00108     {
00109       if(A_model_hbond_surfaces && transform_hbond_surfaces) 
00110         A_model_hbond_surfaces->transform(R, T);
00111       if(A_binding_site_mesh && transform_mesh) 
00112         A_binding_site_mesh->transform(R, T);
00113       Sitemap::transform(R, T);
00114     }
00115 
00116     inline void 
00117     inverse_transform(const my_float_t* R, const my_float_t* T,
00118                       const bool transform_mesh = true, 
00119                       const bool transform_hbond_surfaces = true)
00120     {
00121       if(A_model_hbond_surfaces && transform_hbond_surfaces) 
00122         A_model_hbond_surfaces->inverse_transform(R, T);
00123       if(A_binding_site_mesh && transform_mesh) 
00124         A_binding_site_mesh->inverse_transform(R, T);
00125       Sitemap::inverse_transform(R, T);
00126     }
00127 
00128     inline void 
00129     revert(const bool transform_mesh = true, 
00130            const bool transform_hbond_surfaces = true)
00131     {
00132       if(A_model_hbond_surfaces && transform_hbond_surfaces) 
00133         A_model_hbond_surfaces->revert();
00134       if(A_binding_site_mesh && transform_mesh) A_binding_site_mesh->revert();
00135       Sitemap::revert();
00136     }
00137 
00140     inline void
00141     get_current_inverse_3D_transform(Quaternion *Q, my_float_t *T) const
00142     {
00143 
00144       // If ICP was used (only reason to currently call this function), 
00145       // we should be able to use surface points -- once things are allowed
00146       // some flexibility we will need to choose something like the fixed
00147       // alpha carbons to compute the rigid body transformation
00148       if(A_binding_site_mesh)
00149         A_binding_site_mesh->get_current_inverse_3D_transform(Q, T);
00150       else{
00151         // Sites need not have hbond points
00152         if(hbond_pts->fit_pts_size()) 
00153           hbond_pts->get_current_inverse_3D_transform(Q, T);
00154         else
00155           hphob_pts->get_current_inverse_3D_transform(Q, T);
00156       }
00157     }
00158 
00159     const ModelHbondSurfaces*
00160     model_hbond_surfaces() const
00161     { return A_model_hbond_surfaces; }
00162 
00164     const geometry::TransformableTrimesh&
00165     binding_site_mesh_handle() const
00166     { return *A_binding_site_mesh; }
00167 
00169 
00172     geometry::TransformableTrimesh&
00173     mutable_binding_site_mesh_handle()
00174     { return *A_binding_site_mesh; }
00175 
00176     ModelHbondSurfaces*
00177     mutable_model_hbond_surfaces()
00178     { return A_model_hbond_surfaces; }
00179 
00180     bool
00181     write_msms_caps(std::string &ofname_pref)
00182     {
00183       if(A_model_hbond_surfaces) 
00184         return A_model_hbond_surfaces->write_msms_caps(ofname_pref);
00185       std::cerr << "Cannot write msms caps if surfaces do not exist\n";
00186       return false;
00187     }
00188 
00191     void
00192     compute_max_feature_vals(std::vector<my_float_t> *max_feat_vals,
00193                              const my_float_t max_corr_surf_pt_dist) const;
00194 
00196     const std::vector<my_float_t>&
00197     get_max_feature_vals() const
00198     { return A_max_feature_vals; }

00205     static const my_float_t MIN_PERIMETER;
00206     static const my_float_t MAX_PERIMETER;
00207     static const my_float_t MIN_LONGEST_SIDE;
00208     static const my_float_t MAX_LONGEST_SIDE;
00209     static const my_float_t MIN_SHORTEST_SIDE;
00210     static const my_float_t MAX_SHORTEST_SIDE;
00211     static const uint BUCKETS_PER_A_PERIMETER;
00212     static const uint BUCKETS_PER_A_LENGTH;
00213     static const uint NUMBER_OF_TYPE_HASH_CLASSES;
00214     static const std::string _fname;

00218     void clear();
00219   
00222     void init();

00224     void create_index_table();
00225 
00226     void compute_combinations(std::vector<uint>* arr_p, int index, int length);
00227 
00228     // List is used because we have interators pointing to triangles and
00229     // are adding to the list at the same time.  And at no point do we 
00230     // look up items in the list by value, but rather, through the index table.
00231     std::list<triangle_t> triangles;
00232     index_table_t index_table;
00233     interact_pts_vci A_pts_begin;  
00234     ModelHbondSurfaces* A_model_hbond_surfaces;
00235     geometry::TransformableTrimesh *A_binding_site_mesh;
00236     std::vector<my_float_t> A_max_feature_vals;
